description: Write a function called `check_range(num, min_val, max_val)` that returns True if num is between min_val and max_val (inclusive), False otherwise.
output_specification: Expected output format will be shown.
notes: Implement the Boolean Logic problem correctly
Consider edge cases and boundary conditions
Test your solution with various inputs
hints: Start with the base case or simple scenario
Build up to the complete solution step by step
